name: Personalised Notebook
description:
A personalised Birth Flower Notebook.

A notebook personalised with your own words and the birth flower of your choice.

We have 12 different flowers for each month of the year, and we add in a bit of detail as to the traits that are associated with those months and flowers.

name: Notebook Journal
description:
It's the perfect companion for your work, taking it with you to meetings or simply personal journaling and reflecting.

Personalize your Journal and Notebook with your name, initials, or a mantra on the spine.

name: Soft Cover Journal
description:
No rain no flowers spiral notebook - so cute and so inspirational.

Designed, manufactured, and printed in the USA.

This handmade, one-of-a-kind journal is perfect for note taking on the go, or just to jot down thoughts throughout the day.

Size:
5.5 x 8.5 inches

Details:
- Spiral bound, double silver wire
- 100 sheets/50 double sided individual pages
- college ruled
- matte laminated soft cover
- front cover print only

name: Spiral Notebooks
description:
This soft cover journal is a great reminder to never forget how wildly capable you are.

These spiral notebooks are great for on-the-go note-taking, journaling, making lists, + more.

Designed, manufactured, and printed in the USA.

Size:
5.5 x 8.5 inches

Notebook Details:
- Spiral-bound, double silver wire
- 200 sheets/100 double-sided individual pages
- college ruled
- matte laminated soft cover
- front cover print only
- solid color back cover
